sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Announces Share Consolidation of Class A Ordinary Shares
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. announced a 1-for-50 share consolidation of its Class A ordinary shares, effective December 22, 2025, to increase its per share trading price. This move aims to help the company regain compliance with Nasdaq's listing requirements, as it previously received a delisting notification. The consolidated shares will begin trading on an adjusted basis on December 23, 2025.

feed.title: Cheer Holding announces 1-for-50 share consolidation to maintain Nasdaq listing
feed.summary: Cheer Holding Inc. (NASDAQ:CHR) will implement a 1-for-50 share consolidation effective December 22, 2025, to maintain its Nasdaq listing after receiving a delisting notification. The company, which provides mobile internet infrastructure in China, has seen its stock price drop significantly and is addressing non-compliance issues. This consolidation aims to raise the stock price, with share adjustments and a new CUSIP number for trading starting December 23.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Announces Share Consolidation of Class A Ordinary Shares
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. announced a 1-for-50 share consolidation of its Class A ordinary shares, effective December 22, 2025. This action is primarily intended to increase the per-share trading price to maintain its Nasdaq listing, following a delisting notification due to its stock price falling below $0.10. Post-consolidation, the company expects to regain compliance with Nasdaq's continued listing requirements.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Announces Share Consolidation of Class A Ordinary Shares
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. announced a 1-for-50 share consolidation of its Class A Ordinary Shares, effective December 22, 2025. This move aims to increase the company's per-share trading price to maintain its Nasdaq listing compliance, following a delisting notification in November 2025. Post-consolidation, trading will begin on a Nasdaq-adjusted basis on December 23, 2025, with the number of outstanding shares reduced from approximately 362.5 million to 7.25 million.

feed.title: Cheer Holding to Execute 1-for-50 Share Consolidation to Address Nasdaq Delisting Risk
feed.summary: Cheer Holding (CHR) will implement a 1-for-50 share consolidation on December 22, 2025, to boost its stock price and avoid delisting from Nasdaq after trading below $0.10. This move, approved by shareholders, will significantly reduce the number of outstanding Class A ordinary shares and is a critical step before an appeal hearing scheduled for January 13, 2026. Spark, TipRanks' AI Analyst, rates CHR as Neutral, acknowledging strong financial performance but cautioning on bearish technicals and a low P/E ratio.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Announces Share Consolidation of Class A Ordinary Shares
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. announced a 1-for-50 share consolidation of its Class A ordinary shares, becoming effective on December 22, 2025. This aims to increase the per-share trading price to maintain its Nasdaq listing, following a delisting notification due to low stock price. The post-consolidation shares will begin trading on December 23, 2025.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Announces Share Consolidation of Class A Ordinary Shares
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. announced a 1-for-50 share consolidation of its Class A ordinary shares, effective December 22, 2025, to increase its per share trading price and maintain its Nasdaq listing. The shares will begin trading on a post-consolidation adjusted basis on December 23, 2025, reducing the number of outstanding shares from 234,309,902 to approximately 4,686,199. This action is intended to address a delisting notification received due to the Company's stock closing below $0.10 for ten consecutive trading days.

feed.title: Cheer Holding (CHR) Stock: Buyout Bids, Nasdaq Delisting Risk and Wild Penny-Stock Volatility as of December 9, 2025
feed.summary: Cheer Holding (NASDAQ: CHR) is experiencing extreme volatility due to two preliminary buyout offers significantly above its current trading price, concurrent Nasdaq delisting proceedings for failing to meet minimum bid requirements, and aggressive dilution through new share offerings. The company is evaluating the non-binding buyout proposals and contesting the delisting while attempting to raise capital, creating a highly speculative environment for investors. Its underlying business includes a mobile internet and AI ecosystem in China, showing profitability but facing significant capital structure changes.

feed.title: Cheer Holding receives Nasdaq delisting notice over low share price
feed.summary: Cheer Holding Inc. (NASDAQ:CHR) has received a Nasdaq delisting notice due to its Class A ordinary shares trading below $0.10 for ten consecutive days and below $1 for 30 consecutive business days. The company plans to appeal the delisting by November 26 and is considering a share consolidation to regain compliance. Despite the stock's poor performance, the company exhibits strong gross profit margins and a healthy cash-to-debt ratio.

feed.title: Cheer Holding receives Nasdaq delisting notice
feed.summary: Cheer Holding has received a notice from Nasdaq indicating that its securities will be delisted due to the company's failure to maintain the minimum bid price requirement. The delisting will take effect on December 2, 2025, and trading will be suspended at that time. Cheer Holding does not intend to appeal this decision.

feed.title: Cheer Holding, Inc. Faces Delisting from Nasdaq Due to Non-Compliance with Listing Rules
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHR) is facing delisting from Nasdaq due to its Class A ordinary shares consistently closing at $0.10 or less for ten consecutive trading days, violating the Low Priced Stocks Rule, and remaining below $1 for 30 days. The company has until November 26, 2025, to appeal this determination, or trading will be suspended on December 1, 2025. Cheer Holding plans to appeal and is exploring options like a previously approved share consolidation to regain compliance with Nasdaq listing rules.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Faces Nasdaq Delisting Due to Low Share Price
feed.summary: Cheer Holding (CHR) received a Nasdaq delisting notice on November 18, 2025, due to its stock price remaining at or below $0.10 for ten consecutive trading days. The company plans to appeal the decision by November 26, 2025, and is considering a previously approved share consolidation to regain compliance. Despite strong financial performance, a TipRanks' AI Analyst report labeled CHR as "Neutral" due to bearish technical indicators, low P/E ratio, and lack of dividend yield.

feed.title: Cheer Holding (NASDAQ: CHR) Stock Today: Tiny AI Metaverse Player Weighs Two Takeover Bids as Shares Spike Pre‑Market
feed.summary: Cheer Holding Inc. (NASDAQ: CHR) is evaluating two competing non-binding cash offers for its Class A shares, priced at $0.56 and $0.52, significantly above its current trading price of under $0.05. A Special Committee has been formed to assess these proposals for the Beijing-based mobile internet and AI company. Despite a pre-market spike, the stock remains in penny-stock territory, facing high volatility and a Nasdaq minimum bid price deficiency notice.

feed.title: Cheer Holding, Inc. Forms Special Committee to Evaluate Acquisition Proposals for Class A Shares
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. has announced the formation of a special committee to evaluate two preliminary non-binding acquisition proposals for its Class A ordinary shares, offering $0.56 and $0.52 per share respectively. The committee, comprising independent directors, will assess these offers with the possibility of engaging external advisors, though the Board cautions that no definitive agreements have been reached. This move highlights market interest in Cheer Holding's mobile internet services and technologies, while also noting potential challenges or investor uncertainty reflected in the differing proposal valuations.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Forms Special Committee to Evaluate the Two Preliminary Non-Binding Proposals to Acquire All of Its Shares
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. announced the formation of a special committee to evaluate two non-binding proposals to acquire all of its outstanding Class A ordinary shares. One proposal is from Zhongsheng Dingxin Investment Fund Management (Beijing) Co., Ltd. for US$0.56 per share, and the other is from Excel Ally Ventures Limited for US$0.52 per share. The special committee will include independent financial and legal advisors to assist in its evaluation.

feed.title: Cheer Holding forms special committee to evaluate buyout offers
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHR) has established a special committee to evaluate two non-binding acquisition proposals. The offers from Zhongsheng Dingxin Investment Fund Management and Excel Ally Ventures Limited, ranging from $0.52 to $0.56 per share, represent a significant premium over the current market price of $0.05 per share. The committee, comprising independent directors, will assess these proposals with the aid of independent financial and legal advisors.

feed.title: Cheer Holding receives Nasdaq minimum bid price deficiency notice
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. announced receiving a Nasdaq deficiency notice as its stock traded below the $1.00 minimum bid price for 30 consecutive business days. The company has until April 14, 2026, to regain compliance by having its shares close at $1.00 or above for at least ten consecutive business days. This development follows a recent public offering that raised approximately $8.5 million for the company.

feed.title: Univest Securities, LLC Announces Closing of $15 Million Registered Direct Offering for its Client Cheer Holding, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHR)
feed.summary: Univest Securities, LLC announced the closing of a $15 million registered direct offering for its client, Cheer Holding, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHR). The offering involved the sale of 187,500,000 Class A ordinary shares at $0.08 per share, with Univest Securities, LLC acting as the sole placement agent. Cheer Holding, Inc. is a leading provider of advanced mobile internet infrastructure and platform services, focusing on building a digital ecosystem for web3.0 leveraging AI technology.

feed.title: Cheer Holding, Inc. Announces $15 Million Registered Direct Offering of Class A Ordinary Shares | CHR Stock News
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. is conducting a registered direct offering of 187.5 million Class A ordinary shares at $0.08 per share, aiming to raise approximately $15 million. This financing is intended to support the company's initiatives in building a digital ecosystem leveraging advanced technologies like AI, 5G, and blockchain. The offering is expected to close around November 6, 2025, with Univest Securities, LLC acting as the sole placement agent.

feed.title: Cheer Holding, Inc. Announces $15 Million Registered Direct Offering
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHR) has announced a definitive agreement for a registered direct offering totaling $15 million. The company will sell 187,500,000 Class A ordinary shares (or pre-funded warrants) at $0.08 per share to certain investors, with the transaction expected to close around November 6, 2025. Univest Securities, LLC is acting as the sole placement agent for this offering.

feed.title: Cheer Holding (NASDAQ: CHR) enters registered direct to raise $15M, priced at $0.08
feed.summary: Cheer Holding (NASDAQ: CHR) announced a registered direct offering of 187,500,000 Class A ordinary shares or pre-funded warrants at $0.08 per share, aiming to raise approximately $15 million. The offering is expected to close around November 6, 2025, with Univest Securities acting as the sole placement agent. This offering is being made under a shelf registration statement on Form F-3.

feed.title: Cheer Holding, Inc. Receives Notice of Non-Compliance from NASDAQ Due to Minimum Bid Price Requirement
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. has received a NASDAQ compliance notice for failing to meet the minimum bid price requirement of $1.00 per share for 30 consecutive business days. The company has 180 days, until April 14, 2026, to regain compliance by having its shares trade at or above $1.00 for ten consecutive business days. Failure to comply could lead to delisting, though the notice does not immediately affect its stock trading.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Receives Nasdaq Notification of Non-Compliance with Listing Rules 5550(a)(2)
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. received a notice from Nasdaq on October 16, 2025, indicating non-compliance with the minimum bid price requirement of $1.00 per share. The company has a compliance period of 180 calendar days, until April 14, 2026, to regain compliance by having its Class A ordinary shares close at or above $1.00 for ten consecutive business days. This notification does not immediately affect the listing or trading of the Company's securities.

feed.title: Univest Securities, LLC Announces Closing of $8.5 Million Public Offering for its Client Cheer Holding, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHR)
feed.summary: Univest Securities, LLC announced the closing of an $8.5 million public offering for Cheer Holding, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHR), a provider of mobile internet infrastructure and platform services. The offering included units consisting of Class A ordinary shares, Series A warrants, and Series B warrants, with proceeds intended for general working capital, including sales and marketing for user acquisition. Univest Securities, LLC acted as the sole placement agent for this offering.

feed.title: Univest Securities, LLC Announces Closing of $8.5 Million
feed.summary: Univest Securities, LLC announced the closing of an approximately $8.5 million public offering for its client Cheer Holding, Inc. The offering comprised 12,686,565 units, each including a Class A ordinary share or pre-funded warrant, and Series A and B warrants, with a public offering price of $0.67 per Unit. The aggregate gross proceeds for Cheer Holding are intended for general working capital and corporate purposes, including user acquisition.

feed.title: Cheer Holding closes $8.5 million public offering of units on best efforts basis
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. (NASDAQ:CHR) has completed a public offering of units, raising approximately $8.5 million in gross proceeds. The offering involved 12,686,565 units, each priced at $0.67, consisting of Class A ordinary shares or pre-funded warrants, and Series A and Series B warrants. The company intends to use the net proceeds for general working capital, corporate purposes, and user acquisition.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Announces $8.5 Million Public Offering
feed.summary: Cheer Holding announced a public offering of 12,686,565 units, including Class A shares and warrants, expected to raise approximately $8.5 million. The proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including sales and marketing expenses, to bolster its financial position and growth initiatives. An analyst currently rates CHR stock as a Hold with a $0.50 price target, while TipRanks' AI Analyst Spark assesses it as "Neutral" due to strong financial performance contrasted with bearish technical momentum.

feed.title: Cheer Holding Full Year 2024 Earnings: EPS: US$2.51 (vs US$3.53 in FY 2023)
feed.summary: Cheer Holding reported its Full Year 2024 earnings with EPS at US$2.51, a decrease from US$3.53 in FY 2023. The company's revenue was US$147.2m, down 3.4%, and net income fell 15% to US$26.0m, resulting in a profit margin of 18%. Simply Wall St highlighted 3 warning signs for investors to consider regarding Cheer Holding.

feed.title: SHAH CAPITAL MANAGEMENT Increases Stake in Cheer Holding Inc
feed.summary: SHAH CAPITAL MANAGEMENT increased its stake in Cheer Holding Inc by acquiring an additional 312,521 shares at $2.49 each, bringing its total holdings to 1,614,921 shares. This move signifies the firm's confidence in the significantly undervalued company, which now constitutes 15.70% of its portfolio. Despite Cheer Holding Inc's current growth challenges, SHAH CAPITAL MANAGEMENT's investment reflects a strategic belief in its long-term potential, supported by its strong financial foundation and integration of AI technology in the Media - Diversified industry.

feed.title: CHEERS Telepathy Elevates to AI Marketing Tool for Creative Content Across the Value Chain
feed.summary: Cheer Holding, Inc. announced the launch of CHEERS Telepathy, an AI marketing tool for creative content, on iOS, Android, and WeChat platforms. This multimodal AI content creation platform leverages the Polaris Intelligent Cloud to generate diverse content, from text to video scripts, and integrates advanced natural language processing, computer vision, and deep learning to automate and optimize content creation based on user feedback. The tool aims to enhance marketing effectiveness, improve work efficiency, and provide creative assistance for individuals and businesses, contributing to brand building and user interaction.
